info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berrien County through 530 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of St. Joseph, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coloma, Lake Michigan Beach, Watervliet and Paw Paw Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 196 between mile markers 3 and 7. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 38 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
